name: ng2-http
description: Angular2 HttpModule wrapper with decorators and interceptors

scripts.build:dist: npm run build:umd && npm run build:ngc
scripts.push: npm run commit && git push origin master
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && npm run build:demo && npm run typedoc
scripts.gh-pages-push: git add . && git commit -m 'chore(docs): build demo and docs' && git push && git checkout master
scripts.release: standard-version && npm run build:dist && npm run commit && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.postrelease: npm run build:clean && npm run gh-pages
